SELECT /* InsepctionResultMapper.selectInspectionResultCategoryContent 원승언 */ CHCTP.CTG_ID , CHCTP.CTG_NM , CHCTP.STND_SCORE , SUM(EVCH.SCORE) TOTAL_RECEIVED_SCORE , SUM(CASE WHEN EVAN.EVIT_ANSW_CONTENT IN('적합', '매우좋음', '좋음', '보통') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) PROFIT_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN EVAN.EVIT_ANSW_CONTENT IN('부적합', '매우나쁨', '나쁨') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) NON_PROFIT_CNT , COUNT(EVAN.EVIT_ANSW_CONTENT) TOTAL_EVALUATION_CNT FROM EVIT_ANSW EVAN INNER JOIN CHKLST_EVIT CHEV ON EVAN.EVIT_ID = CHEV.EVIT_ID INNER JOIN EVIT_CHCLST EVCH ON EVCH.EVIT_ID = EVAN.EVIT_ID INNER JOIN CHKLST_CTG CHCTC ON CHCTC.CTG_ID = CHEV.CTG_ID INNER JOIN CHKLST_CTG CHCTP ON CHCTP.CTG_ID = CHCTC.MASTER_CTG_ID
EVAN.EVIT_ANSW_CONTENT = EVCH.CHCLST_CONTENT
AND EVAN.INSP_RESULT_ID = #{inspResultId}
GROUP BY CHCTP.CTG_ID, CHCTP.CTG_NM, CHCTP.STND_SCORE

SELECT /* InsepctionResultMapper.selectAnswImgByInspResultId 원승언 */ EAI.EVIT_ID , EVIT_ANSW_IMG_PATH , SEQ FROM EVIT_ANSW_IMG EAI INNER JOIN EVIT_ANSW EVAN ON EVAN.INSP_RESULT_ID = EAI.INSP_RESULT_ID AND EVAN.EVIT_ID = EAI.EVIT_ID
AND EAI.INSP_RESULT_ID = #{inspResultId}
